alert.note: Alert for Fleming (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:10PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Fleming and northern Rowan Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 110 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Foxport to Goddard to Hillsboro. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Plummers Landing around 115 PM EDT. Muses Mills around 120 PM EDT. Sharkey around 125 PM EDT. Hilda and Waltz around 130 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Munson, Hays Crossing, Triplett, Cranston, Morehead, Rodburn, Haldeman, Christy and Gates. THIS INCLUDES Interstate 64 in eastern Kentucky between mile markers 139 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
